### About me

I’m an Economics PhD student at Universidad de los Andes. My primary interests are Crime Economics, Urban Economics and Public Policy. I’m also interested in Applied Econometrics, Big Data, and Machine Learning.

You can find my CV <a href="https://eduard-martinez.github.io/cv/CV_Eduard_F_Martinez_G.pdf">here</a>.

  + <p><strong style="color:black;font-size:16px;"> Teaching Assitance: </strong> Big Data and Machine Learning for Applied Economics - Econ 4676, Department of Economics, Universidad de los Andes, Colombia. 2022 - Currently.
